June 17, 2012 D Hebden Bridge March Contest
Hebden Bridge March Contest 1 March Contest Hebden Bridge March and Hymn Tune Contest hebden-bridge-march-contest
Hebden Bridge, West Yorkshire The Alan Bottomley Memorial Shield Combined score for Hymn Tune & March Marsden Band
The Moyles Trophy Overall March winners Marsden Band Sponsored by Moyles Hotel & Restaurant
Highest placed 2nd section band City of Bradford Band Sponsored by Hebden Royd Council
Highest placed 3rd section band Elland Band Sponsored by DFG Solicitors
Highest placed 4th section band Greenfield Band Sponsored by Britvic
Highest placed Youth Band Elland Youth Band Sponsored by Calrec Audio
Best March whilst marching Marsden Band Sponsored by Prince Frederick Lodge
Best Hymn Tune Marsden Band Sponsored by Prince Frederick Lodge
The Mortimer Trophy Best Instrumantalist (Youth Section) Tom Fox (Elland Youth) Sponsored by The British Open Championships
Deportment Uppermill Band Sponsored by Rock Drill Engineering Ltd
